sentences: Ryan Lott is an American composer and musician who was born in Denver, Colorado, and is based in Los Angeles.
He is also a member of Sisyphus and has scored the soundtracks for a number of films, most notably Mean Dreams (2017), Paper Towns (2015), and The Disappearance of Eleanor Rigby (2013).
In 2020, Lott composed the soundtrack for the adventure game Tell Me Why.
Sisyphus (Asthmatic Kitty/Joyful Noise, 2014) (with Sisyphus, as Son Lux)
Beak & Claw (Anticon, 2012) (with Sisyphus, as Son Lux)
